shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000

shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_init_1=
per_frame_init_2=c_x = 0.5;
per_frame_init_3=c_y = 0.5;
per_frame_1=q1 = aspectx;
per_frame_2=q2 = aspecty;
per_frame_3=rot = 0;
per_frame_4=zoom = 1;
per_frame_5=warp = 0;
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=vol = bass*8 + mid*4 + treb*2;
per_frame_9=vol = vol*above(vol,17);
per_frame_10=monitor = vol;
per_frame_11=beat = above(vol,res);
per_frame_12=diff = (1-beat)*diff + beat*(vol-res);
per_frame_13=res = beat*(vol+2*diff) + (1-beat)*(res - (diff*0.04 + 0.12)*60/fps);
per_frame_14=res = max(0,res);
per_frame_15=monitor = res;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=r = if(beat, 0.01*(int(rand(200))-100)*0.01,r);
per_frame_18=rot = r;
per_frame_19=
per_frame_20=c_x = if(beat,0.5 + 0.5*(int(rand(200))-100)*0.01, c_x);
per_frame_21=c_y = if(beat,0.5 + 0.5*(int(rand(200))-100)*0.01, c_y);
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=
per_frame_24=q3 = c_x;
per_frame_25=q4 = c_y;
per_pixel_1=d = (pow(sqrt(sqr(x-q3)+sqr(y-q4)),2)-0.);
per_pixel_2=v = 0.03;
per_pixel_3=dx = v*(x-q3)*d;
per_pixel_4=dy = v*(y-q4)*d;
warp_1=`float2 d, uv_y, uv_z;
warp_2=`float3 dx, dy;
warp_3=`
warp_4=`shader_body
warp_5=`{
warp_6=`
warp_7=`   float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_8=`   float3 rand = tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5;
warp_9=`
warp_10=`   d = texsize.zw*4;
warp_11=`   dx = 0.5*(2*GetBlur1(uv_orig + float2(1,0)*d) - 2*GetBlur1(uv_orig - float2(1,0)*d));
warp_12=`   dy = 0.5*(2*GetBlur1(uv_orig + float2(0,1)*d) - 2*GetBlur1(uv_orig - float2(0,1)*d));
warp_13=`   
warp_14=`   d = lerp(uv_orig,uv,1);
warp_15=`   uv_y = d - float2(dx.y,dy.y)*texsize.zw*6;
warp_16=`   uv_z = d - float2(dx.z,dy.z)*texsize.zw*6;
warp_17=`
warp_18=`
warp_19=`   ret.y = GetPixel(uv_y).y - 0.008 + (1-GetPixel(uv_orig).x)*0.018;
warp_20=`   ret.z = GetPixel(uv_z).z - 0.008 + (0+GetPixel(uv_orig).x)*0.018;
warp_21=`
warp_22=`    ret.x = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv+rand*texsize.zw*.5 ).x;
warp_23=`    ret.x += (2*ret.x - 2*GetBlur3(uv).x)*0.525 + rand*0.0042;
warp_24=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 d = texsize.zw;
comp_4=`    float3 dx = ( GetPixel(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetPixel(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_5=`    float3 dy = ( GetPixel(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetPixel(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_6=`float2 dz = float2(dx.y,dy.y)*3;
comp_7=`
comp_8=`d = texsize.zw*2;
comp_9=`dx = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_10=`dy = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_11=`
comp_12=`dz +=float2(dx.y,dy.y);
comp_13=`
comp_14=`float3 bg = pow(length(dz)*0.8+0,0.7) + GetBlur2(uv).y*0.4-0.1;
comp_15=`
comp_16=`ret = bg*float3(0.3,0.5,0.7);
comp_17=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(0.2,0.1,0),GetPixel(uv + float2(dx.x,dy.x)*texsize.zw*18).x*6);
comp_18=`ret = lerp(ret,1,GetPixel(uv).z);
comp_19=`
comp_20=`//ret = GetPixel(uv);
comp_21=`}
